descriptionlist.description:
This version was compiled to work from iOS 9 - 12 (including A12 devices)
I DID NOT CREATE THIS PACKAGE, CREDITS GOES TO THE ORIGINAL DEVELOPER KYLE HOWELS. IF YOU NEED SUPPORT FOR THIS VERSION, CONTACT ME ON REDDIT /u/BrunoNFL.

Select text and move the cursor using gestures on the keyboard.

Swipe anywhere to move the cursor. Swipe from the shift (or delete) keys to select text.

There is a pro version available which adds settings to allow you to configure it's behaviour.

changelog.change:
1.5.6
- Temporarily fix the Respring Loop by making the user having to respring after changing settings
